name: Modern Translator
description:
This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam 4 Its a Game where communicating with the AI is the challenge:  Solve fun small puzzles and get through the levels. Its kind of simulating a language barrier: The AI can only talk in Emojis. Its up for the player to figure out how to solve the puzzles.

Controlls:

Movement: WASD/Arrow keys 

Use: Space/Left click

Journal: TAB/J
